snippet: After the former publicist for the troubled musical seeks dismissal of a lawsuit against him, the producers respond with details of phony emails sent to warn a potential investor.
abstract: After the former publicist for the troubled musical seeks dismissal of a lawsuit against him, the producers respond with details of phony emails sent to warn a potential investor.

headline.main: Dueling Court Filings by 'Rebecca' Combatants Reveal Backstage Drama
